Description:
NPE when apply style from css file in Layout
Build number:2.3.0.v20071210

Steps to reproduce:
1. Copy attached css file to your birt project.
2. New a report.
3. Insert a label.
4. In outline->Styles, right click,select Use CSS File..., select the css file.
5. Right click the label, apply the style "table1" to it.

Expected result:
Style can be applied to label item.

No available styles in apply style menu, and then click Layout, NPE throws out.
